# Stealthy (Feat)
## Overview
You are good at avoiding unwanted attention and slipping out of bonds.

**Benefit**: You get a +2 bonus on all [[Escape Artist (Skill)|Escape Artist]] and [[Stealth (Skill)|Stealth]] skill checks. If you have 10 or more ranks in one of these skills, the bonus increases to +4 for that skill.

**Source:** PF Core Rulebook, pg. 135
